summary: Frontend testing completed for LiveJobsCore refactoring. Both Live Jobs (free) and Live Jobs 1 (premium) pages load correctly using the shared LiveJobsCore component. All UI elements verified working: page titles, Auto-Apply AI Agent panel, search functionality, Apply button dialog with 3-step wizard. Navigation between all pages works correctly.

ui_bugs.issue: Nav item data-testid for 'Live Jobs 1' has space instead of hyphen (nav-live-jobs 1 vs nav-live-jobs-1)

issues: Recommendations loading may be slow due to RapidAPI rate limits - shows 'Loading recommendations...' for extended time

passed_tests: Login flow with test credentials (test_autoapply@example.com / testpass123)
Live Jobs page loads with correct title 'Live Jobs'
Live Jobs page shows description 'Discover job opportunities from multiple free sources'
Live Jobs 1 page loads with correct title 'Live Jobs 1'
Live Jobs 1 page shows description 'Premium job listings powered by RapidAPI'
Auto-Apply AI Agent panel visible on both pages
Auto-Apply stats display (Today, Total, Success Rate)
Search form shows Keywords, Location, Source, Remote Only fields
Job cards display with Apply buttons (data-testid='apply-job-{index}')
Apply dialog shows 3-step wizard (Tailor Resume → Review & Edit → Apply)
Tailor Resume with AI button in dialog (data-testid='tailor-resume-btn')
Navigation to Live Jobs 1 works (via link click)
action_items: Minor: Fix DashboardLayout nav item data-testid generation to replace all spaces with hyphens (use replaceAll instead of replace)
critical_code_review_comments: LiveJobsCore refactoring successful - code reduced from 5309 to 1570 lines (70% reduction)
Both variants (free/premium) use same component with different props
Console warning: 'Each child in a list should have a unique key prop' in LiveJobsCore - should add unique keys to list items
context_for_next_testing_agent: LiveJobsCore refactoring verified working. Both Live Jobs (free) and Live Jobs 1 (premium) pages use the shared component correctly. Live Jobs (free) shows 18+ job recommendations from free sources. Live Jobs 1 (premium) may show 'Loading recommendations...' due to RapidAPI rate limits. Search functionality works on both pages. Apply button opens 3-step wizard dialog. Profile completion is at 63% which shows warning but doesn't block functionality.
